title: GAME CRASHES AFTER CHAMPION PICK RITO PLS READ
body:
So me and my friend were normally playing and then he bought a new HP PC. He tried to play a game, and once he picked a champ and the loading started his game crashed. He was unable to reconnect and he said that a message poped up saying: Please fix resolution 1680x1050-60 HZ. So he tried that and it didnt work. We were searching for all methods how to fix it but nothing worked. So i hope you can help us with this problem that we just cant fix. 

Hes nick is: officialnova

Also, excuse my not perfect English.

replies.body: I have spent all night trying to fix this issue....please help

Since he got a new rig, it's probably behind on updates.  As a first step, he should make sure his OS is updated to the most current version.  I then recommend using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure his drivers are up to date as well.  Have him join a custom game to test things out.

If he continues to have issues, ask him to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help him out directly!
So, he updated everything and used the FPS issues guide. But still it didnt work. He submited a support ticket.
